name: Mia's City-Dash
description:
Welcome to Mia's City-dash

In this endless-runner adventure you play as the protagonist Mia and your goal is, to collect soda, bugs and keychains which are scattered around the city. These things can be traded for new outfits by your friend, who works at the nearby cafe. Or you can buy some cake and coffee, your choice ;)

While the game still has some graphical glitches, it's almost finished. So i feel comfortable enough to release it now.

This game can run on Nintendo hardware but it isn't licensed or endorsed by them. Homebrewing a Nintendo 3DS will nullify its warranty (i'm sure you know that already). This game should not be sold under any circumstance. If you bought this game somehow, you probably got scammed
